00025 /**
00026  * The Push Notification Message.
00027  *
00028  * The class represents a message to be delivered to an end user device.
00029  * Notification Service.
00030  *
00031  * @ingroup ApnsPHP_Message
00032  * @see http://tinyurl.com/ApplePushNotificationPayload
00033  */
00034 class ApnsPHP_Message
00035 {
00036     const PAYLOAD_MAXIMUM_SIZE = 256; /**< @type integer The maximum size allowed for a notification payload. */
00037 
00038     protected $_bAutoAdjustLongPayload = true; /**< @type boolean If the JSON payload is longer than maximum allowed size, shorts message text. */
00039 
00040     protected $_aDeviceTokens = array(); /**< @type array Recipients device tokens. */
00041 
00042     protected $_sText; /**< @type string Alert message to display to the user. */
00043     protected $_nBadge; /**< @type integer Number to badge the application icon with. */
00044     protected $_sSound; /**< @type string Sound to play. */
00045 
00046     protected $_sCustomPropertyName; /**< @type string Custom property name. */
00047     protected $_mCustomPropertyValue; /**< @type mixed Custom property value. */
00048 
00049     protected $_nExpiryValue = 604800; /**< @type integer That message will expire in 604800 seconds (86400 * 7, 7 days) if not successful delivered. */
00050 
00051     /**
00052      * Constructor.
00053      *
00054      * @param  $sDeviceToken @type string @optional Recipients device token.
00055      */
00056     public function __construct($sDeviceToken = null)
00057     {
00058         if (isset($sDeviceToken)) {
00059             $this->addRecipient($sDeviceToken);
00060         }
00061     }
00062 
00063     /**
00064      * Add a recipient device token.
00065      *
00066      * @param  $sDeviceToken @type string Recipients device token.
00067      * @throws ApnsPHP_Message_Exception if the device token
00068      *         is not well formed.
00069      */
00070     public function addRecipient($sDeviceToken)
00071     {
00072         if (!preg_match('~[a-f0-9]{64}~i', $sDeviceToken)) {
00073             throw new ApnsPHP_Message_Exception(
00074                 "Invalid device token '{$sDeviceToken}'"
00075             );
00076         }
00077         $this->_aDeviceTokens[] = $sDeviceToken;
00078     }
00079 
00080     /**
00081      * Get a recipient.
00082      *
00083      * @param  $nRecipient @type integer @optional Recipient number to return.
00084      * @throws ApnsPHP_Message_Exception if no recipient number
00085      *         exists.
00086      * @return @type string The recipient token at index $nRecipient.
00087      */
00088     public function getRecipient($nRecipient = 0)
00089     {
00090         if (!isset($this->_aDeviceTokens[$nRecipient])) {
00091             throw new ApnsPHP_Message_Exception(
00092                 "No recipient at index '{$nRecipient}'"
00093             );
00094         }
00095         return $this->_aDeviceTokens[$nRecipient];
00096     }
00097 
00098     /**
00099      * Get the number of recipients.
00100      *
00101      * @return @type integer Recipient's number.
00102      */
00103     public function getRecipientsNumber()
00104     {
00105         return count($this->_aDeviceTokens);
00106     }
00107 
00108     /**
00109      * Get all recipients.
00110      *
00111      * @return @type array Array of all recipients device token.
00112      */
00113     public function getRecipients()
00114     {
00115         return $this->_aDeviceTokens;
00116     }
00117 
00118     /**
00119      * Set the alert message to display to the user.
00120      *
00121      * @param  $sText @type string An alert message to display to the user.
00122      */
00123     public function setText($sText)
00124     {
00125         $this->_sText = $sText;
00126     }
00127 
00128     /**
00129      * Get the alert message to display to the user.
00130      *
00131      * @return @type string The alert message to display to the user.
00132      */
00133     public function getText()
00134     {
00135         return $this->_sText;
00136     }
00137 
00138     /**
00139      * Set the number to badge the application icon with.
00140      *
00141      * @param  $nBadge @type integer A number to badge the application icon with.
00142      * @throws ApnsPHP_Message_Exception if badge is not an
00143      *         integer.
00144      */
00145     public function setBadge($nBadge)
00146     {
00147         if (!is_int($nBadge)) {
00148             throw new ApnsPHP_Message_Exception(
00149                 "Invalid badge number '{$nBadge}'"
00150             );
00151         }
00152         $this->_nBadge = $nBadge;
00153     }
00154 
00155     /**
00156      * Get the number to badge the application icon with.
00157      *
00158      * @return @type integer The number to badge the application icon with.
00159      */
00160     public function getBadge()
00161     {
00162         return $this->_nBadge;
00163     }
00164 
00165     /**
00166      * Set the sound to play.
00167      *
00168      * @param  $sSound @type string @optional A sound to play ('default sound' is
00169      *         the default sound).
00170      */
00171     public function setSound($sSound = 'default')
00172     {
00173         $this->_sSound = $sSound;
00174     }
00175 
00176     /**
00177      * Get the sound to play.
00178      *
00179      * @return @type string The sound to play.
00180      */
00181     public function getSound()
00182     {
00183         return $this->_sSound;
00184     }
00185 
00186     /**
00187      * Set a custom property.
00188      *
00189      * @param  $sName @type string Custom property name.
00190      * @param  $mValue @type mixed Custom property value.
00191      * @throws ApnsPHP_Message_Exception if custom property name is not outside
00192      *         the Apple-reserved 'aps' namespace.
00193      */
00194     public function setCustomProperty($sName, $mValue)
00195     {
00196         if ($sName == 'aps') {
00197             throw new ApnsPHP_Message_Exception(
00198                 "Property name 'aps' can not be used for custom property."
00199             );
00200         }
00201         $this->_sCustomPropertyName = trim($sName);
00202         $this->_mCustomPropertyValue = $mValue;
00203     }
00204 
00205     /**
00206      * Get the custom property name.
00207      *
00208      * @return @type string The custom property name.
00209      */
00210     public function getCustomPropertyName()
00211     {
00212         return $this->_sCustomPropertyName;
00213     }
00214 
00215     /**
00216      * Get the custom property value.
00217      *
00218      * @return @type mixed The custom property value.
00219      */
00220     public function getCustomPropertyValue()
00221     {
00222         return $this->_mCustomPropertyValue;
00223     }
00224 
00225     /**
00226      * Set the auto-adjust long payload value.
00227      *
00228      * @param  $bAutoAdjust @type boolean If true a long payload is shorted cutting
00229      *         long text value.
00230      */
00231     public function setAutoAdjustLongPayload($bAutoAdjust)
00232     {
00233         $this->_bAutoAdjustLongPayload = (boolean)$bAutoAdjust;
00234     }
00235 
00236     /**
00237      * Get the auto-adjust long payload value.
00238      *
00239      * @return @type boolean The auto-adjust long payload value.
00240      */
00241     public function getAutoAdjustLongPayload()
00242     {
00243         return $this->_bAutoAdjustLongPayload;
00244     }
00245 
00246     /**
00247      * PHP Magic Method. When an object is "converted" to a string, JSON-encoded
00248      * payload is returned.
00249      *
00250      * @return @type string JSON-encoded payload.
00251      */
00252     public function __toString()
00253     {
00254         try {
00255             $sJSONPayload = $this->getPayload();
00256         } catch (ApnsPHP_Message_Exception $e) {
00257             $sJSONPayload = '';
00258         }
00259         return $sJSONPayload;
00260     }
00261 
00262     /**
00263      * Convert the message in a JSON-encoded payload.
00264      *
00265      * @throws ApnsPHP_Message_Exception if payload is longer than maximum allowed
00266      *         size and AutoAdjustLongPayload is disabled.
00267      * @return @type string JSON-encoded payload.
00268      */
00269     public function getPayload()
00270     {
00271         $aPayload['aps'] = array();
00272 
00273         if (isset($this->_sText)) {
00274             $aPayload['aps']['alert'] = (string)$this->_sText;
00275         }
00276         if (isset($this->_nBadge) && $this->_nBadge > 0) {
00277             $aPayload['aps']['badge'] = (int)$this->_nBadge;
00278         }
00279         if (isset($this->_sSound)) {
00280             $aPayload['aps']['sound'] = (string)$this->_sSound;
00281         }
00282 
00283         if (isset($this->_sCustomPropertyName, $this->_mCustomPropertyValue)) {
00284             $aPayload[$this->_sCustomPropertyName] = $this->_mCustomPropertyValue;
00285         }
00286 
00287         $sJSONPayload = json_encode($aPayload, JSON_FORCE_OBJECT);
00288         $nJSONPayloadLen = strlen($sJSONPayload);
00289 
00290         if ($nJSONPayloadLen > self::PAYLOAD_MAXIMUM_SIZE) {
00291             if ($this->_bAutoAdjustLongPayload) {
00292                 $nTextLen = strlen($this->_sText);
00293                 if ($nJSONPayloadLen - $nTextLen <= self::PAYLOAD_MAXIMUM_SIZE) {
00294                     $this->_sText = substr($this->_sText, 0, $nTextLen - ($nJSONPayloadLen - self::PAYLOAD_MAXIMUM_SIZE));
00295                     return $this->getPayload();
00296                 } else {
00297                     throw new ApnsPHP_Message_Exception(
00298                         "JSON Payload is too long: {$nJSONPayloadLen} bytes. Maximum size is " .
00299                         self::PAYLOAD_MAXIMUM_SIZE . " bytes. The message text can not be auto-adjusted."
00300                     );
00301                 }
00302             } else {
00303                 throw new ApnsPHP_Message_Exception(
00304                     "JSON Payload is too long: {$nJSONPayloadLen} bytes. Maximum size is " .
00305                     self::PAYLOAD_MAXIMUM_SIZE . " bytes"
00306                 );
00307             }
00308         }
00309 
00310         return $sJSONPayload;
00311     }
00312     
00313     /**
00314      * Set the expiry value.
00315      *
00316      * @param  $nExpiryValue @type integer This message will expire in N seconds
00317      *         if not successful delivered.
00318      */
00319     public function setExpiry($nExpiryValue)
00320     {
00321         if (!is_int($nExpiryValue)) {
00322             throw new ApnsPHP_Message_Exception(
00323                 "Invalid seconds number '{$nExpiryValue}'"
00324             );
00325         }
00326         $this->_nExpiryValue = $nExpiryValue;
00327     }
00328     
00329     /**
00330      * Get the expiry value.
00331      *
00332      * @return @type integer The expire message value (in seconds).
00333      */
00334     public function getExpiry()
00335     {
00336         return $this->_nExpiryValue;
00337     }
00338 }
